interactiveService.description: All customers when buying wholesale or retail at {storeName} can interact at:

deliveryAndOrderingTime.headline: 2. Delivery and ordering time:
deliveryAndOrderingTime.deliverySchedule: Placed order: Delivering goods as scheduled by both parties.
deliveryAndOrderingTime.objectiveCase: In objective case: Return the goods afters 3 days or have direct communication with the customer.
deliveryAndOrderingTime.highBuildingCase: For customer in hight-rise condominiums, offices, and restaurant located on upper floors, please receive the goods on the ground floor or at the most convenient location to pick-up.

paymentMethod.headline: 3. Payment Methods:
paymentMethod.outsideProvince: For orders outside province, we only accept payment via 100% bank transfer in advance or receiving payment and delivering the goods at the designated location provided by the customer.

returnAndWarranty.title: Return and Warranty Policy
returnAndWarranty.effort: Hung Nguyet Printing always strives to bring customers excellent shopping products and continuously improving after-sales services. Therefore, Hung Nguyet Printing has improved and implemented a Warranty Policy for Hung Nguyet Printing's products.

applicable.title: Applicable Conditions:
applicable.freeCase: The product is warranted free of charge for the corresponding period of use in the following cases:
applicable.packagingError: Defects caused by manufacturing, improper packaging, missing product components, or product quality not meeting the promised specifications.
applicable.shippingError: Defects caused during the transportation process from our company to the customer.

refuse.title: Hung Nguyet Printing refuses to warranty the product in the following cases:
refuse.notFromUs: The product is not manufactured or supplied by Hung Nguyet Printing, or the defects are caused by customer interference or natural disasters.
refuse.customerFactor: The product is damaged and faulty due to customer-caused factors such as scratches, product no longer being intact due to external forces, or being affected by weather conditions (wind, rain) during the usage process.
refuse.allCaseDecision: In all cases, the decision of Hung Nguyet Printing is final.

returnAndWarranty.note: Note: To avoid unwanted situations, when receiving the product, customers should carefully inspect the product, packaging specifications, and product quality.
returnAndWarranty.finalNote: {storeName} always aims to bring the utmost satisfaction to customers!

mainProcess.inquiries: For customers who have inquiries, please contact us through the following channels: Call/sms/zalo: {phoneNumber} - Email: {email}
mainProcess.gather: We gather customer information to understand their various needs, such as the main beverage they are selling, whether they require paper or plastic cups, and whether they need single-color or multi-color printing
mainProcess.satisfied: Receive requests and transmit information to the design department. Send a demo and make revisions according to the requirements until the customer is satisfied
mainProcess.produce: Transfer information regarding the order to the production workshop. Monitor progress, approve samples for mass production
mainProcess.delivery: Deliver the goods to the customer's address in Kỳ Anh or send the goods to the requested shipping providers

validation.loginAutomatic: You have been logged in automatically

aboutPage.title: Introduce About Hung Nguyet Printing
aboutPage.welcome: Welcome to Hung Nguyet Printing! We are a newly established printing studio, but we have quickly built a reputation and established ourselves in this field. We pride ourselves on delivering hight-quality printing products and reliable services to our customers.
aboutPage.vision: Our vision is to become one of the leading and most trusted printing studios in the market. We are committed to metting the diverse requirements of our customers and providing them with effective and creative printing solutions
aboutPage.service: We provide a wide range of printing services, including printing on materials such as paper, plastic, fabric, packaging, and many other types of products. By ultilizing advanced printing technology and modern equipment, we ensure that the colors and images on the printed products are clear, sharp, and high quality.
aboutPage.satisfaction: We not only focus on delivering high-quality printing products but alse prioritize customer satisfaction. We listen to and closely interact with our customers to understand their needs and requirements. We accompany our customer throughtout the entire process, from the initital design stage to the printing process and final delivery.
aboutPage.value: With a commitment to delivering value and enjoyment to our customers, we continuously strive to create unique and impressive printing products. We believe that creativity and quality are essential elements to meet and exceed customer expectations.
aboutPage.visitUs: Visit Hung Nguyet Printing if you are seeking a professional and trustworthy printing parnet. We are more than willing to support and accompany you in every printing project.

resetPasswordNote: Please enter your email address below to receive a password reset link.
sendInformationMessage: Please fill in the message content in the form below and send it to us. We will reply to you after receiving it.

SEO.title: Hung Nguyet Printing - Quality Printing for Bags, Cups & Mugs
SEO.keywords: Plastic bag printing, Foam bag printing, Nylon bag printing, Bag printing, Gift bag printing, Plastic cup printing, Plastic mug printing, Glass cup printing, Beautiful plastic bags, Premium foam bags, Logo printing on plastic bags, Image printing on plastic cups, Nylon bags for food storage, Plastic bags for product storage, Plastic cups for drinking water, Cosmetic bag printing, Image printing on plastic cups, Company gift bag printing, Food product storage bags, Plastic cup printing with text, images.
SEO.description: Welcome to Hung Nguyet Printing – your trusted source for high-quality plastic bag, foam bag, and plastic cup printing services in Ky Anh, Ha Tinh.
